text: Raagam Anuragam is a 1991 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Nikhil, starring Mukesh and Madhuri in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Mukesh * Adoor Bhasi * Captain Raju * Madhuri ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Raagam Anuragam
